custom_item_2.description: CIS Control 1 (1.4) Maintain Detailed Asset Inventory
custom_item_2.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the organization have an established policy or procedure detailing how assets/devices are added or removed from inventory?

custom_item_3.description: CIS Control 1 (1.6) Ensure that unauthorized assets are removed, quarantined or the inventory is updated
custom_item_3.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the organization have an established policy or procedure specifying a timeframe for which assets/devices are removed from inventory or inventory is updated?

custom_item_4.description: CIS Control 2 (2.1(b)) Maintain and Inventory of Authorized Software
custom_item_4.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have an established policy defining a timeframe to to remediate software issues, such as removing unauthorized applications and/or patching out of date/unsupported software?
custom_item_4.cmd: printf '@2_1_2_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @2_1_2_Support@'

custom_item_5.description: CIS Control 2 (2.1(a)) Maintain and Inventory of Authorized Software
custom_item_5.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a current list of approved software?
custom_item_5.cmd: printf '@2_1_1_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of List of Approved Software: @2_1_1_Support@'

custom_item_6.description: CIS Control 3 (3.4(b)) Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools
custom_item_6.info: Does the organization have any exceptions in place for any endpoint devices as it applies to patches being up to date?
custom_item_6.cmd: printf '@3_4_2_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of list of endpoints that have an exception: @3_4_2_Support_1@\\nLocation of exception policy: @3_4_2_Support_2@'

custom_item_7.description: CIS Control 3 (3.4(c)) Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools
custom_item_7.info: OPTIONAL: Does the organization have a policy in place that dictates the required timeframe that patches must be applied to end point devices?
custom_item_7.cmd: printf '@3_4_3_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @3_4_3_Support@'

custom_item_8.description: CIS Control 3 (3.4(a)) Deploy Automated Operating System Patch Management Tools
custom_item_8.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the organization have a policy in place which dictates how Operating Systems are kept up to date?
custom_item_8.cmd: printf '@3_4_1_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @3_4_1_Support@'

custom_item_9.description: CIS Control 3 (3.6(a)) Deploy Automated Software Patch Management Tools
custom_item_9.info: Does the organization have a policy in place which dictates how Authorized Software is kept up to date?
custom_item_9.cmd: printf '@3_6_1_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @3_6_1_Support@'

custom_item_10.description: CIS Control 3 (3.6(b)) Deploy Automated Software Patch Management Tools
custom_item_10.info: Does the organization have a policy in place which dictates how Authorized Software is kept up to date?
custom_item_10.cmd: printf '@3_6_2_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of list of endpoints that have an exception: @3_6_2_Support_1@\\nLocation of exception policy: @3_6_2_Support_2@'

custom_item_11.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined password policy?
custom_item_11.cmd: printf '@4_2_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @4_2_Support@'

custom_item_12.description: CIS Control 4 (4.3) Ensure the Use of Dedicated Administrative Accounts
custom_item_12.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined Administrative account on each system where elevated access is required, for each user accessing that account (no shared accounts, each user is required to have their own Administrative account)?

custom_item_13.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a documented secure configuration for each of their device types, applications/software?

custom_item_14.info: Implementation Group 1 - Has the organization checked each endpoint/ log collection system to determine if devices are properly configured?

custom_item_15.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the organization maintain a logging policy for each endpoint?
custom_item_15.cmd: printf '@6_2_1_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @6_2_1_Support@'

custom_item_16.description: CIS Control 7 (7.7) Use of DNS Filtering Services
custom_item_16.info: Implementation Group 1 - Is the Organization utilizing DNS Filtering Services?
custom_item_16.cmd: printf '@7_7_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of list of services in use: @7_7_Support@'

custom_item_17.description: CIS Control 8 (8.4) Configure Anti-Malware Scanning of Removable Media
custom_item_17.info: Does your organization configure devices so that they automatically conduct an anti-malware scan of removable media when inserted or connected?

custom_item_18.description: CIS Control 8 (8.5) Configure Devices to Not Auto Run Content
custom_item_18.info: Implementation Group 1 - Are systems configured to NOT automatically run content when a remote device is attached to the host?

custom_item_19.description: CIS Control 10 (10.1) Ensure Regular Automated Backups
custom_item_19.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined backup policy which states that systems are backed-up at a regular interval?
custom_item_19.cmd: printf '@10_1_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @10_1_Support@'

custom_item_20.description: CIS Control 10 (10.2) Perform Complete System Backups
custom_item_20.info: Implementation Group 1 - Are key systems being backed up on a regular basis?

custom_item_21.info: Implementation Group 1 - Are backups protected via physical security or encryption when they are stored or moved across the network?

custom_item_22.description: CIS Control 10 (10.5) Ensure All Backups Have at Least One Offline Backup Destination
custom_item_22.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the organization store at least one full backup offline (that is not accessible from the network)?

custom_item_23.description: CIS Control 12 (12.1) Maintain an Inventory of Network Boundaries
custom_item_23.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a network diagram defining all the boundary devices as defined above?

custom_item_24.description: CIS Control 12 (12.4(a)) Deny Communications Over Unauthorized Ports
custom_item_24.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization maintain a list/document of devices known to be firewalls or port filters?

custom_item_25.description: CIS Control 12 (12.4(b)) Deny Communications Over Unauthorized Ports
custom_item_25.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined network traffic policy for each subnet?
custom_item_25.cmd: printf '@12_4_2_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @12_4_2_Support@'

custom_item_26.description: CIS Control 13 (13.1) Maintain an Inventory of Sensitive Information
custom_item_26.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined classification policy?
custom_item_26.cmd: printf '@13_1_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @13_1_Support@'

custom_item_27.description: CIS Control 13 (13.2) Remove Sensitive Data or Systems Not Regularly Accessed by Organization
custom_item_27.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined access frequency policy?
custom_item_27.cmd: printf '@13_2_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @13_2_Support@'

custom_item_28.description: CIS Control 13 (13.6) Encrypt Mobile Device Data
custom_item_28.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined classification policy?
custom_item_28.cmd: printf '@13_6_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @13_6_Support@'

custom_item_29.description: CIS Control 14 (14.6) Protect Information Through Access Control Lists
custom_item_29.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a defined configuration policy?
custom_item_29.cmd: printf '@14_6_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @14_6_Support@'

custom_item_30.description: CIS Control 16 (16.8(a)) Disable Any Unassociated Accounts
custom_item_30.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a list of all business roles?
custom_item_30.cmd: printf '@16_8_1_Answer@ - @Attesting_User@\\nLocation of Policy or Policy Statement: @16_8_1_Support@'

custom_item_31.description: CIS Control 16 (16.8(b)) Disable Any Unassociated Accounts
custom_item_31.info: Implementation Group 1 - Does the Organization have a list of all computer and applications accounts?
